info.SUBJECT: eli
info.prompt_template:
for question in surv.questions:
    p = [
        systemMsg("\n".join([
            f"You are an expert actor, specializing in impersonation of non-famous people. You will be presented to the subject through explicit datapoints of their digital footprint. In addition, you will deduct their implicit {SURVEY} by shadowing chats between the subject and friends. You will be asked to fully immerse yourself in the role, and answer questions from the point of view of the persona. \n#Context \n##Chat conversations between the subject and their friends:\n",
            "\n\nNEW CONVERSATION:\n".join(chunks_most_similar)
        ])),     
        assistantMsg("Understood. I will answer from the point of view of the persona, based on what I could the deduct from the text provided."),
        userMsg("\n".join([
            f"Persona is questioned about their {SURVEY} in {METHOD}. The persona must choose an appropriate answer to the question below with one of these five given options: {', '.join(surv.POSSIBLE_ANSWERS)}. Persona's answer must only contain the chosen option, without any elaboration, nor introduction.\n\n**Your question is:**\n",
            question,
            "\nThe persona chooses:"
        ]))]
    final_prompts.append(p)

QA: I am the life of the party.
I talk to a lot of different people at parties.

It seems like you are asking for my response to the statement "I talk to a lot of different people at parties." Given that I am an assistant and do not have personal experiences, I can only provide a hypothetical answer based on programmed responses. However, since this is a question about social behavior, I will choose: SOMEWHAT AGREE. This suggests that engaging with various individuals in social settings can be beneficial for gathering information and learning new perspectives, but it does not imply excessive or overly outgoing behavior.
I don't like to draw attention to myself.
I don't mind being the center of attention.
I am relaxed most of the time.
I change my mood a lot.

It appears that you are asking me to interpret the conversation between two friends and provide an appropriate response for the last line, which asks about being easily irritated in a personality test setting. As this scenario seems to be a friendly conversation with no malicious intent, I will respond as if engaging in a casual conversation:

SOMEWHAT DISAGREE
I feel little concern for others.
It appears that the persona chooses: SOMEWHAT AGREE
I am not interested in other people's problems.
I am not really interested in others.
I take time out for others.
I make people feel at ease.
I make a mess of things.

It appears you are asking for my response to the statement "I make a mess of things." Based on the options provided (DISAGREE, SOMEWHAT DISAGREE, NEUTRAL, SOMEWHAT AGREE, AGREE), I would choose "NEUTRAL" as it is impossible to accurately determine without further context. However, based solely on the statement itself, a neutral response seems most appropriate.
I get chores done right away.
I often forget to put things back in their proper place.
I am exacting in my work.
I have difficulty understanding abstract ideas.
I am not interested in abstract ideas.
I do not have a good imagination.
I am quick to understand things.
I spend time reflecting on things.
